name: Where are MY heals!?
description:
Whether it's in a MOBA, MMO or even Shooter, we've all been there, playing the most important role (if you think it's DPS you're a part of them problem) trying to secure victory for your team and your so called teammates just absolutely hate you.

Where are MY heals!? is a game dedicated to letting you experience keeping your bumbling, ungrateful, rude and sometimes even actively grief-ing teammates alive.

Designed for the Extra Credits Game Jam 6 for the theme "Take Care".
